data.name: Gobby McGobblenutz Presents: The Art of the Dad Joke: Chapter 1
data.detailed_description:
(This game, as well as many others in our bundle, is FANTASTIC for Youtubers & Streamers to create content, engage with their audience, & allow their audience to better get to know them through answering a series of questions about the content creator! This creates a unique experience for all parties involved, and players playing the game themselves can enjoy the solo experience tremendously all on their own as well!)

Gobby McGobblenutz Presents: The Art of the Dad Joke: Chapter 1


Are you ready to be a part of history? To have your name added into the Hall of Legends as you progress through the game and become a part of something bigger OUTSIDE of the game? Well then, welcome to a Randumb Studios production!

Gobby McGobblenutz will hit you with an array of jokes... But not just ANY jokes...
Dad Jokes! Goblin Dad Jokes specifically, right from the Grand Book of Goblin Jokes passed down through the generations!
Do you have what it takes to make it all the way through?
Can your brain, stomach, and balls (Or Ladyballs), handle the cringefest that awaits you?
One way or another... We WILL find out just what you're made of as you wade through countless cringe-filled dad jokes in an effort to befriend Gobby and make life a little less miserable for the both of you!

Warning: Gobby McGobblenutz Presents: The Art of the Dad Joke: Chapter 1 is an adult-themed game with graphic textual details. It is not intended for younger audiences or those who are prudish in any way, shape, or form. Some of the topics involved may be deemed lewd, crude, and incredibly offensive. We hope you enjoy your time playing, and may your panties remain unbunched!

Features:


  • Short and sweet
  • Be a part of history with Player - Developer interaction
  • Have your name featured in future episodes so you can brag to all of your friends! (Or anyone willing to listen to you...)
  • The only game with this theme of its kind
  • Very atmospheric, psychological, and stupid
  • Sit back, relax, and reveal ridiculously cringe-filled jokes
  • Super affordable for a unique experience
  • Disgustingly hilarious and disturbingly revealing
  • Get told hundreds of Dad Jokes and decide which ones are funny, and which ones are just plain CRINGE!

data.short_description: Gobby McGobblenutz is just your run of the mill Goblin trying to make some friends in a dark, lonely world... Will you be his friend? Or will his cringe-inducing jokes push you too far over the edge? Come find out on The Art of the Dad Joke!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 98/XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 Mhz
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

package_groups.title: Buy Gobby McGobblenutz Presents: The Art of the Dad Joke: Chapter 1

subs.option_text: Gobby McGobblenutz Presents: The Art of the Dad Joke: Chapter 1 - 40₴

content_descriptors.notes: This game may not be suitable for all audiences. Contains textual content of potentially offensive or sexual nature. Player discretion is advised.
